p.seg: Kamenarovic 284: Il en va de même de l'intelligence.
mais comprendre qu'on n'est pas intelligent
voila une situation qui evite la ruine à un pays
et le péril a un prince.
The improving of an echo is not in (improving) the echo, it lies (improving) the sound.
The improving of a shadow is not in (improving) the shadow, it is in (improving) the shape (which the shadow is the shadow of).
the force of "does not want to" is exactly "should not"!
